English: At the start of the next turn, gain "This turn, fixed abilities gain +&a% critical damage". Removed after a critical hit.
Chinese: 下个回合开始时，获得“回合结束前，固定能力的暴击伤害+&a%”增益。造成暴击后解除。

English: Dodge the next attack. If successful, fixed abilities gain +110% critical rate this turn.
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 闪避成功时回合结束前固定能力暴击率+110%。

English:
Yuzu's fixed skills are enhanced this turn. 
These enhancements carry over to the next turn.
Chinese:
柚子的固定技能直到回合结束前得到了强化。|
这些强化会保留到下一个回合。

English:
Can use fixed abilities.
Fixed abilities are refreshed every turn and come with basic effects.
Fixed abilities always cost 1 mana.

Lv2: If a fixed skill is not used by the end of the turn, it is automatically used on the target with the most debuffs, dealing -50% damage as a follow-up attack.
Lv3: Fixed abilities can be used even when unable to act.
Lv4: Critical damage +22%. All terrain affinity is upgraded to SS.

Terrain Affinity: A~C
Chinese:
可以使用固定能力。
固定能力每回合都会刷新，附带基本功。
固定能力的法力值消耗固定为1。

Lv2：回合结束时若固定技能未被使用，则对减益种类最多的目标释放，造成的伤害-50%，视为追加攻击。
Lv3：无法行动时也可以释放固定能力。
Lv4：暴击伤害+22%，所有的场地适应性改为SS。

场地适应性：A~C

English: Yuzu Hanaoka. A member of the Game Development Club at Millennium Science School. She loves making and playing games, and her passion for gaming is no joke.
Chinese: 花冈柚子。千年科学学园所属，游戏开发部的部长。喜欢制作和游玩游戏，对游戏的热情绝非随便说说。

English: Even in a different outfit, Yuzu remains Yuzu, but it seems her range of abilities has slightly expanded. Together with the Game Development Club, she faces various challenges.
Chinese: 即使是和平时不同的样子，柚子也会保持柚子的样子，但是能做的事情的范围好像稍微扩大了一点。和游戏开发部的大家一起，直面各种各样的困难。

English:
This turn, the fixed ability's attack targets the enemies on the left and right of the original target. 
If there is only one enemy, additionally trigger the passive effect at Lv2.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力的攻击对象增加目标左右两边的敌人；
只有一个敌人时，额外触发一次被动Lv2级的效果。

English:
This turn, the fixed ability deals an additional &a (90% ATK) damage. 
Fixed ability's critical damage +26%.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力的回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a(90%攻击力)的伤害；
固定能力暴击伤害+26%

English:
This turn, actively used fixed abilities gain +42% critical damage. 
Passively triggered fixed abilities are guaranteed to crit.
Chinese:
回合结束前，主动释放的固定能力暴击伤害+42%；
通过被动释放的固定能力以暴击形式命中。

English:
This turn, fixed abilities gain +20% critical rate. 
Randomly adds one additional enemy as a target for fixed abilities. 
If there is only one enemy, draw a skill.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力的暴击率+20%；
固定能力的攻击对象随机增加一个敌人。
若场上只有一个敌人，抽取一个技能。

English: This turn, fixed abilities gain +25% critical damage.
Chinese: 回合结束前，固定能力的暴击伤害+25%。

English:
Fixed abilities deal an additional &a (60% ATK) damage. 
Additionally trigger the passive effect at Lv2. For each fixed skill on cooldown, repeat this effect once. 
If the cooldown belongs to a fixed skill of a Millennium Science School student, repeat it an additional time. (Repeats &b times)
Chinese:
固定能力额外增加&a(60%攻击力)的伤害。
额外触发一次被动Lv2级的效果。
使用时每有一个冷却中的固定技能重复一次，若冷却的是【千年科技学院】学生的固定技能额外重复一次。(重复&b次)

English: Bonds of the Game Development Club

This turn, fixed abilities deal an additional &a (90% ATK) damage. 
All effects applied to fixed abilities this turn, except for "Cardboard Box", are extended to the next turn.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a(90%攻击力)的伤害；
除‘纸箱’外，所有赋予固定能力回合结束前的效果将额外延长至下一回合。

English:
This turn, fixed abilities deal an additional &a (140% ATK) damage. 
When drawn, draw an additional skill.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a(140%攻击力)的伤害；
抽到时额外抽取一个技能。

English:
This turn, fixed abilities deal an additional &a (100% ATK) damage. 
This turn, when dealing damage, prioritize drawing one of your own skills and reduce its cost by 1.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a(100%攻击力)的伤害；
回合结束前，固定能力造成伤害时优先抽取自己的一个技能，其费用减少1点。

English: This turn, fixed abilities deal an additional &a (50% ATK) damage and target all enemies.
Chinese: 回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a（50%攻击力）的伤害；攻击目标改为所有敌人。

English:
This turn, fixed abilities deal an additional &a (360% ATK) damage and deal &b (120% ATK) splash damage to enemies on either side. 
Subsequent uses of this skill deal an additional &c (100% ATK) damage and &d (30% ATK) splash damage to enemies on either side.
Chinese:
回合结束前，固定能力额外增加&a(360%攻击力)的伤害，造成伤害时对两侧敌人造成&b(120%攻击力)的溅射伤害。
后续释放此技能时，改为额外增加&c(100%攻击力)的伤害。造成伤害时对两侧敌人造成&d(30%攻击力)的溅射伤害。
